医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示组织桥在颈脊髓损伤中的预后价值脊髓损伤 (SCI) 恢复的预后对于直接受影响的人和周围的人来说非常重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Study-shows-prognostic-value-of-tissue-bridges-in-cervical-spinal-cord-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Study-shows-prognostic-value-of-tissue-bridges-in-cervical-spinal-cord-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c082f9e4-5261-4f3d-96c4-481d4dec9310 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 14:07:00 -0400 Study shows prognostic value of tissue bridges in cervical spinal cord injury
人工智能模型在进行医疗诊断评估时可能会使用“人口统计捷径”人工智能模型通常在医疗诊断中发挥作用，尤其是在分析 X 射线等图像时。然而，研究发现这些模型并不总是在所有人口群体中表现良好，通常在女性和有色人种中表现更差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/AI-models-may-be-using-e2809cdemographic-shortcutse2809d-when-making-medical-diagnostic-evaluations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/AI-models-may-be-using-e2809cdemographic-shortcutse2809d-when-making-medical-diagnostic-evaluations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cb87474-e58c-4e0b-90bc-5938a11aa569 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 13:16:17 -0400 AI models may be using “demographic shortcuts” when making medical diagnostic evaluations
基于远程策略的干预为患有多发性硬化症的记忆障碍患者带来了希望一项试点研究表明，为多发性硬化症 (MS) 引起的记忆障碍患者提供了一种新的治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Remote-strategy-based-intervention-shows-promise-for-individuals-with-memory-impairments-caused-by-MS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Remote-strategy-based-intervention-shows-promise-for-individuals-with-memory-impairments-caused-by-MS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11b413e8-3aa2-4531-89e4-f6400ce64993 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 13:10:43 -0400 Remote strategy-based intervention shows promise for individuals with memory impairments caused by MS
有意义的社交互动对情感幸福感、压力和孤独感产生积极的净结果新研究发现，与同龄人进行有意义的社交互动可以降低孤独感和提高情感幸福感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Meaningful-social-interactions-have-net-positive-outcomes-for-affective-well-being-stress-and-loneiness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Meaningful-social-interactions-have-net-positive-outcomes-for-affective-well-being-stress-and-loneiness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e87eaae4-b2f8-425e-9b16-0230cfe56446 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 13:02:00 -0400 Meaningful social interactions have net positive outcomes for affective well-being, stress, and loneliness
ERC 高级拨款资助泛素在 DNA 修复和基因组稳定性中的研究分子生物学研究所 (IMB) 执行主任兼美因茨约翰内斯古腾堡大学 (JGU) 教授 Helle Ulrich 教授获得了欧洲研究理事会 (ERC) 的高级资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/ERC-Advanced-Grant-aids-study-on-ubiquitin-in-DNA-repair-and-genome-stability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/ERC-Advanced-Grant-aids-study-on-ubiquitin-in-DNA-repair-and-genome-stability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13053d8e-c2dc-4d75-b52c-03a7a03987f3 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 12:55:07 -0400 ERC Advanced Grant aids study on ubiquitin in DNA repair and genome stability
化疗对睾丸癌幸存者听力和生活质量的长期影响由南佛罗里达大学和印第安纳大学的研究人员领导的一项跨学科研究发现了关于最常见的化疗形式之一对癌症幸存者的长期影响的重要发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Long-term-effects-of-chemotherapy-on-hearing-and-quality-of-life-in-testular-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Long-term-effects-of-chemotherapy-on-hearing-and-quality-of-life-in-testular-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af6dac21-f8c3-46a4-bc7d-e68960e6a058 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 12:50:52 -0400 Long-term effects of chemotherapy on hearing and quality of life in testicular cancer survivors
Biosynth 独特的在线定制肽工具集配有完整的订单跟踪和 QC 数据门户Biosynth 是诊断、疫苗和药品关键原材料和服务的供应商，很高兴地宣布其定制肽革命的下一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Biosynthe28099s-unique-online-custom-peptide-toolset-completed-with-full-order-tracking-and-QC-data-portal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Biosynthe28099s-unique-online-custom-peptide-toolset-completed-with-full-order-tracking-and-QC-data-portal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=deedb4f3-ed8d-479b-9209-18142d5299f0 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 12:41:00 -0400 Biosynth’s unique online custom peptide toolset completed with full order tracking and QC data portal
Stilla Technologies 通过 Nio™ 产品线的两种新数字 PCR 配置扩展了产品组合Nio 系列现在由 3 种仪器组成：易于使用的 Nio™ E 配置为所有实验室提供了 Crystal Digital™ PCR 的精髓，Nio™ 是一款灵活的中级仪器，而 Nio™+ 仍然是 Nio 系列的旗舰产品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Stilla-Technologies-expands-product-portfolio-with-two-new-digital-PCR-configurations-for-the-Nioe284a2-product-line.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Stilla-Technologies-expands-product-portfolio-with-two-new-digital-PCR-configurations-for-the-Nioe284a2-product-line.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=674a329d-8c77-492a-b646-6f3b4985ea1e Fri, 28 Jun 2024 12:30:00 -0400 Stilla Technologies expands product portfolio with two new digital PCR configurations for the Nio™ product line
欧洲新的临床指南有助于更好地了解儿童骨癌东安格利亚大学的一位领先研究人员表示，能够更好地了解儿童骨癌的新临床指南将彻底改变欧洲这些年轻患者的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Europes-new-clinical-guidelines-enable-better-understanding-of-childhood-bone-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Europes-new-clinical-guidelines-enable-better-understanding-of-childhood-bone-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c24d2ca-1afe-435f-94c1-90fc10efc8c4 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 12:24:00 -0400 Europe's new clinical guidelines enable better understanding of childhood bone cancer
INTEGRA Biosciences 有望实现净零排放INTEGRA Biosciences 是液体处理解决方案的领先供应商，致力于加速科学发现，同时应对气候变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/INTEGRA-Biosciences-is-on-track-to-net-zero.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/INTEGRA-Biosciences-is-on-track-to-net-zero.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a2f544b-42d9-47c2-ae0b-a7763cc73a08 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 12:22:00 -0400 INTEGRA Biosciences is on track to net zero
